summary.span: 命名空间包含用于将对象序列化为 XML 格式文档或流的类。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that are used to serialize objects into XML format documents or streams.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间中的中心类是类。The central class in the namespace is the class. 若要使用此类，使用构造函数来创建使用对象的类型进行序列化的类的实例。To use this class, use the constructor to create an instance of the class using the type of the object to serialize. 一次是创建，创建要序列化的对象的实例。Once an is created, create an instance of the object to serialize. 您还必须创建的对象，若要将文件写入的文档或流，如， ，或。You must also create an object to write the file to a document or stream, such as a , , or . 然后，可以调用方法将对象转换为 XML 文档。You can then call the method to convert the object into an XML document. 若要反序列化的 XML 文档中的对象，创建适合要读取的文档或流 (再次， ，或)。To deserialize an object from an XML document, create a suitable object to read the document or stream (again, a , , or ). 调用方法，同时强制转换为原始对象 （即进行序列化） 的类型生成的对象。Invoke the method while casting the resulting object to the type of the original object (that was serialized). 若要进一步控制的序列化，命名空间包含多个可以应用于类的成员的类。To further control the serialization, the namespace contains several classes that can be applied to members of a class. 例如，如果类包含将序列化为 XML 元素的成员，则可以应用属性成员。For example, if a class contains a member that will be serialized as an XML element, you can apply the attribute to the member. 在应用特性时，可以指定详细信息，例如实际的 XML 元素名称使用属性。When applying the attribute, you can specify details such as the actual XML element name using the property. 所有属性的完整列表，请参阅类概述。For a complete list of all the attributes, see the class overview.
